bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names zhi chu 汁出 ; liu shui 流水 , water flow; shui yi 水溢 , water spill. Illness Sign of a discharge of liquid from local sores resulting from pathological changes. A variant of chu shui 出水 , discharge of water. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 5: 輕者臍不大腫，但出 汁 , “In mild cases, the umbilicus shows only a light swelling, but there is a discharge of liquid ”.
